line_text: You called me to come down.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Rory, yes, sweetie, thank God you’re here.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Sherry’s gonna be so happy to see you.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Well, we had all planned on next week, but Sherry screwed up, so what can you do?

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Do not mention how fat she is.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: For some reason, she’s extremely sensitive about that today.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: I’ll call you later to find out how everything’s going.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: I’ve gotta get back to work.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Believe me, I would love to stay hon  impossible.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Oh my God, I’m so glad you’re here.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: This wasn’t supposed to happen now.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: I think Maureen called him and left a message but it doesn’t matter because he’s not here.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Oh, well, she had to go back to work, but she said she’d call later.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Well, you’re going to have a baby.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: And she goes back to work.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: I would love to go back to work, but I can’t because I have to stay here.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: Well, yeah, because you’re going to have a baby.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: None of my friends are here.

title: 03x13 - Dear Emily And Richard
line_text: I don’t think that I could do this by myself because this wasn’t supposed to happen until next week.
